snippet: John Tavares scored two goals and had two assists to lead the Islanders over the Carolina Hurricanes, 5-2, on Tuesday night in Raleigh, N.C.
abstract: NHL Roundup; New York Islanders defeat Carolina Hurricanes, 5-2; other NHL news noted.
lead_paragraph: John Tavares scored two goals and had two assists to lead the Islanders over the Carolina Hurricanes, 5-2, on Tuesday night in Raleigh, N.C.

headline.seo: Islanders’ Tavares Has Big Night in Win Over Hurricanes
headline.main: Tavares Has Big Night, Pacing Islanders Past the Hurricanes
headline.print_headline: Tavares Has Big Night, Pacing Islanders Past the Hurricanes
